content: GF#13172 is essentially a request for a technical correction because the snapshots are not generated correctly. I'm not in a hurry to do a technical correction at all. Does this issue justify it?

Forge and Simplifier always re-generate the snapshot anyway, so we don't rely on this correction.
Just wondering, which profiles are affected by this?
Would this affect sliced profiles from the official FHIR IG registry? http://www.fhir.org/guides/registry
